These are the eyes that even Kyuushou would feel "unwilling" when looking at them.
It was this look. It was the look that made Kyuushou feel that he was "unyielding.

설마 나, 아직 포기하지 않았던 거야?
Does it mean that one hasn't given up yet?
Don't tell me I haven't given up yet?
就是这眼神，让那些蝇营狗苟的人，憎恨自己吗？
この目を、あの出世のためならなんでもする恥知らずの意地汚い人間が見て嫌がったという事？
이 눈을, 그 출세를 위해서라면 뭐든지 하는 부끄러움을 모르는 욕심 많은 인간이 보고 싫어했다는 거?
Is that the look that makes those fly-by-night people, hate themselves?
Are you saying that you didn't like seeing this eye in the eyes of that shameless, nasty person who would do anything to get ahead?
不可思议地，内心中的某个部分，竟对这此有着确信。
心のどこかで、不思議とそれを確信している事に気が付いた。

Somewhere in the back of my mind, I realized that I was strangely certain of that.
……もうあれからどれくらい経ったのだろう。

……还是不能摆脱那个时候的心情么？

...... I think we can sort out how we felt at that time now.

그 질문을 거울 속의 나에게 던져보았다.

而镜中的自己，好像在蔑视提问的人。

거울 속의 내가 그렇게 묻는 나를 경멸하는 것 같았다.
And his own self in the mirror seems to scorn the person asking the question.
I felt as if my self in the mirror despised me for asking such a question.
这份蔑视，让铁师一夏恐惧。恐惧自己内心深处的，好像有某种本质即将溢出。因为这么多年来，她父母、她自己还有社会苦心经营的堤坝已被拆毁。
その軽蔑を鉄師一夏は恐れた。その恐怖心は心の奥底から、ある種の本質の部分から溢れ出してくるかのように感じた。長年にわたって両親と自分、そして社会生活が作り上げた堤防が決壊したかのようだった。
철사 이치카는 그 경멸을 두려워했다. 그 공포는 마음 깊은 곳에서, 어떤 본질적인 부분에서 넘쳐나는 것처럼 느껴졌다. 오랜 세월 부모와 나, 그리고 사회생활이 쌓아올린 제방이 무너진 듯했다.

This contempt made the Iron Master Ichika fear. Fear deep within herself, as if some essence was about to overflow. Because the dam that her parents, herself, and society had worked so hard to build over the years had been torn down.

The iron master Issatsu feared that disdain. The fear felt as if it was overflowing from deep within, from some kind of essence. It was as if the levee that my parents, myself, and my social life had built up over the years had burst.
于是，铁师一夏关上了水龙头，走出了盥洗室。

Not wanting to say anything at this point in time, he put his cell phone on silent.
Not wanting to talk about anything now, he switched his phone to silent mode.
回过头，机场大厅巨大的落地窗外，阳光猛烈，只是远处有些许阴翳。

Back outside the huge floor-to-ceiling windows of the airport lobby, the sun was fierce, with just a hint of shade in the distance.
I looked back and saw the intense sunlight shining through the large window panes in the departure area. The only shadows in the situation were quite a distance away.
或许是因为机场人太多了的缘故，室内仍然闷热。
空港が混雑しているためか、屋内なのに蒸し暑かった。

空いている椅子を探そう……。

Nothing more than an everyday view. If I had to say there was something strange, it was that one cloud seemed ...... a little too big?
The view was the same as usual. If there is anything odd about it, those clouds just seem a little ...... too big?

밖에서는 전함「산의 자리」가 마치 보이지 않는 거대한 손에 눌려 찌그러지는 것처럼 휘어지며, 전함의 뼈대가 점점 변형되어 갔다. 거대한 강철 괴물은 금속 잡동사니로 변해버렸다.
